H0.text: Sperm are produced in both the male and female reproductive systems in humans.

H1.text: Nutrients are produced in both the male and female reproductive systems in humans.

H2.text: Fertilized eggs are produced in both the male and female reproductive systems in humans.

H3.text: Sex cells are produced in both the male and female reproductive systems in humans.

A4.text: sperm develop in the testes of males

A5.text: a female is any individual that produces the larger type of gamete called an ovum, and a male produces the smaller type, called a sperm cell or spermatozoon
